title: All the Products Mentioned in Our October Editors' Picks Show

excerpt: Check out all of the beauty and fashion finds our editors loved this month — plus, Fashionista's first jewelry collaboration (and giveaway!).
text: HomeCareersCheck out all of the beauty and fashion finds our editors loved this month — plus, Fashionista's first jewelry collaboration (and giveaway!).Photos: Courtesy of brands; Artwork: Catie Pusateri/FashionistaWatch the full conversation between Fashionista editors Steph Saltzman, Dhani Mau, Brooke Frischer and Janelle Sessoms on The Fashionista Network.We're always trying out new fashion and beauty products over here at Fashionista, and our editors Steph, Dhani, Brooke and Janelle are giving unfiltered reviews on all their October favorites Tuesday, live on The Fashionista Network. (Watch it here!)We'll also be discussing our first-ever, limited-edition product collaboration — two meaningful pieces of handmade jewelry created in partnership with Bluboho. You'll see how we've been wearing the Future Self Envelope Charm and Moonstone Charm Bracelet — and just by watching live, one of you will automatically be entered to win the latter!*Photo: Courtesy of BlubohoYes, you read that correctly. This dainty corded bracelet covered in hand-cut moonstone beads with a 10k recycled yellow gold envelope charm, retailing for $195, could be yours for free.*Scroll to ContinueRecommended ArticlesIf you want to shop the products mentioned in this month's editors' picks show, check them out below.Noname Cashmere Relaxed Rugby Cardigan, $495, available hereCora The Simply Soothing Heat Patch, $15, available hereAtacz Twist Bag, $109, available hereOribe Côte d'Azur Restorative Body Cream, $65, available herePattern Beauty The Hair Steamer, $169, available hereNelle Atelier The Maddy Jean, $258, available hereSummer Fridays The Mini Neutrals Lip Butter Balm Set, $25, available hereAlohas Tb.490 Club Suede Raspberry Leather Sneakers, $200, available herePhoto: Courtesy of BlubohoBluboho x Fashionista Envelope Charm, $198, available herePhoto: Courtesy of BlubohoBluboho x Fashionista Moonstone Charm Bracelet, $198, available hereThis conversation is hosted on The Fashionista Network powered by interactive media platform Fireside, where viewers get the chance to participate and speak directly with industry figures. In no way does this affect our editorial decision-making.Tune into The Fashionista Network to join the conversation with fashion and beauty industry leaders. Sign up here.*Giveaway Terms & ConditionsHow to Enter: Join the Fashionista Network if you haven't already. No further purchase is necessary. Log into your Fireside account and watch the "October Editors' Picks" show live on Oct. 29 at 11 a.m. PT / 2 p.m. ET. Join the show before 11:30 a.m. PT / 2:30 p.m. ET to ensure entry.Prize: Bluboho x Fashionista Moonstone Charm Bracelet, $198 retail value. No cash alternative is available.Eligibility: Members of The Fashionista Network aged 18+ and based in the United States or Canada will be considered entrants. Employees and affiliates of Fashionista, Bluboho and Fireside are ineligible to participate.Giveaway Sponsor: Fashionista (℅ Breaking Media Inc.) will determine the winner. As our collaboration and giveaway partner, Bluboho will provide and ship the bracelet. Fireside, host of the Fashionista Network, will provide a platform for the giveaway.Selection and Notification of Winner: Fashionista will select the winner from a list of confirmed live viewers provided by Fireside, using a random number generator. The winner will be notified by Friday, Nov. 1 via the email address associated with their Fireside account. If they do not claim their prize via an email response within one week of being notified, the prize may be forfeited and another winner may be selected. Winner must provide contact and shipping information if requested, to be shared to enable fulfillment of the prize. Sponsors are not liable for the winner's failure to receive notification of winning due to technical issues or incorrect contact information.Fashionista reserves the right to refuse, withdraw or disqualify entries at our discretionFashionista, Bluboho and Fireside will not use the participant's submission, name, voice, likeness, image, personal information, statements about the contest, etc., for publicity, news, advertising, promotional purposes, trade, and so forth, without any further notice, review, consent, compensation or remuneration.To the extent permitted by law, entry into the giveaway constitutes the participant's agreement to release and hold harmless the Sponsors and its subsidiaries, affiliates, employees, etc., against all claims liability, illness, injury, death, loss, etc., that occurs directly or indirectly from participation in the contest or use/misuse of the awarded prize.To the extent permitted by law, entrants waive all rights to punitive, incidental, or consequential damages, and they waive all rights to have damages multiplied or increased.Subscribe to Our Newsletter
html:
• Home
  • Careers

Check out all of the beauty and fashion finds our editors loved this month — plus, Fashionista's first jewelry collaboration (and giveaway!).

Watch the full conversation between Fashionista editors Steph Saltzman, Dhani Mau, Brooke Frischer and Janelle Sessoms on The Fashionista Network.

We're always trying out new fashion and beauty products over here at Fashionista, and our editors Steph, Dhani, Brooke and Janelle are giving unfiltered reviews on all their October favorites Tuesday, live on The Fashionista Network. (Watch it here!)

We'll also be discussing our first-ever, limited-edition product collaboration — two meaningful pieces of handmade jewelry created in partnership with Bluboho. You'll see how we've been wearing the Future Self Envelope Charm and Moonstone Charm Bracelet — and just by watching live, one of you will automatically be entered to win the latter!*

Yes, you read that correctly. This dainty corded bracelet covered in hand-cut moonstone beads with a 10k recycled yellow gold envelope charm, retailing for $195, could be yours for free.*

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

If you want to shop the products mentioned in this month's editors' picks show, check them out below.

Noname Cashmere Relaxed Rugby Cardigan, $495, available here

Cora The Simply Soothing Heat Patch, $15, available here

Atacz Twist Bag, $109, available here

Oribe Côte d'Azur Restorative Body Cream, $65, available here

Pattern Beauty The Hair Steamer, $169, available here

Nelle Atelier The Maddy Jean, $258, available here

Summer Fridays The Mini Neutrals Lip Butter Balm Set, $25, available here

Alohas Tb.490 Club Suede Raspberry Leather Sneakers, $200, available here

Bluboho x Fashionista Envelope Charm, $198, available here

Bluboho x Fashionista Moonstone Charm Bracelet, $198, available here

This conversation is hosted on The Fashionista Network powered by interactive media platform Fireside, where viewers get the chance to participate and speak directly with industry figures. Learn more about The Fashionista Network here.

Please note: Occasionally, we use affiliate links on our site. In no way does this affect our editorial decision-making.

Tune into The Fashionista Network to join the conversation with fashion and beauty industry leaders. Sign up here.

*Giveaway Terms & Conditions

  • How to Enter: Join the Fashionista Network if you haven't already. No further purchase is necessary. Log into your Fireside account and watch the "October Editors' Picks" show live on Oct. 29 at 11 a.m. PT / 2 p.m. ET. Join the show before 11:30 a.m. PT / 2:30 p.m. ET to ensure entry.
  • Prize: Bluboho x Fashionista Moonstone Charm Bracelet, $198 retail value. No cash alternative is available.
  • Eligibility: Members of The Fashionista Network aged 18+ and based in the United States or Canada will be considered entrants. Employees and affiliates of Fashionista, Bluboho and Fireside are ineligible to participate.
  • Giveaway Sponsor: Fashionista (℅ Breaking Media Inc.) will determine the winner. As our collaboration and giveaway partner, Bluboho will provide and ship the bracelet. Fireside, host of the Fashionista Network, will provide a platform for the giveaway.
  • Selection and Notification of Winner: Fashionista will select the winner from a list of confirmed live viewers provided by Fireside, using a random number generator. The winner will be notified by Friday, Nov. 1 via the email address associated with their Fireside account. If they do not claim their prize via an email response within one week of being notified, the prize may be forfeited and another winner may be selected. Winner must provide contact and shipping information if requested, to be shared to enable fulfillment of the prize. Sponsors are not liable for the winner's failure to receive notification of winning due to technical issues or incorrect contact information.
  • Fashionista reserves the right to refuse, withdraw or disqualify entries at our discretion
  • Fashionista, Bluboho and Fireside will not use the participant's submission, name, voice, likeness, image, personal information, statements about the contest, etc., for publicity, news, advertising, promotional purposes, trade, and so forth, without any further notice, review, consent, compensation or remuneration.
  • To the extent permitted by law, entry into the giveaway constitutes the participant's agreement to release and hold harmless the Sponsors and its subsidiaries, affiliates, employees, etc., against all claims liability, illness, injury, death, loss, etc., that occurs directly or indirectly from participation in the contest or use/misuse of the awarded prize.
  • To the extent permitted by law, entrants waive all rights to punitive, incidental, or consequential damages, and they waive all rights to have damages multiplied or increased.
